title: Puppeteer
desc:
Post 4979
You anonymously have control over a puppet that is basically another player. It'll be randomly assigned a possible role from this server.
You can control what the puppet says (the host will speak for them with your specified messages), how they vote, and how they use their role. You will know all feedback your puppet receives.
Your puppet's assigned role's wincon is ignored.
Your puppet can be visited, voted, etc and can die.
If you die your puppet dies.
